overallFeedback.feedback: Here is the correct translation: He works a lot harder than his colleagues and on top of that, he's more talented than they are But as a result, he has fewer friends. Notice that the MT got a lot of things right!

displaySolutionDescription: Task is updated to contain the solution.
a11yClickableTextLabel: Full text where words can be marked
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
taskDescription:
This task will help you discover the power and limits of machine translation when learning English as a foreign language. Source sentences are in French, but the activity can be adapted to include other language pairs.

The following French sentence has been translated by a free online NMT system. There are two errors, can you find them?

Il travaille beaucoup plus que ses collègues et en plus, il est plus doué qu'eux, mais du coup, il a moins d'amis.
textField: He works a lot harder than his colleagues and on top of that, he's more talented than *them*, but *suddenly* he has fewer friends.
